entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries or rain showers ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind south 20 km/h becoming west 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the morning. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 14.
